home.title: Geometry in Motion
home.intro: Welcome to the interactive Differential Geometry simulator, where mathematics takes shape and moves through three-dimensional space.
home.description1: This virtual environment was created to offer a new way of visualizing complex curves and surfaces. Here, you can explore geometric structures that usually live only on paper or in imagination, transforming them into immersive visual experiences.
home.description2: Our proposal is to connect theory and visualization. Parametric curves, smooth surfaces, torsion, curvature... all within your reach in a simple, distraction-free interface.
home.quote: “Mathematics is not just numbers; it is a language to describe space and the beauty within it.”

about.title: About the Simulator
about.intro: This simulator was created to provide an interactive experience for studying Differential Geometry.
about.description: Its goal is to offer an educational tool that makes learning curves and surfaces more accessible, visual, and intuitive. Through 3D exploration, users can dynamically observe geometric properties.
about.tech: The project combines modern technologies such as React, Three.js, and TailwindCSS, integrating computational visualization with advanced mathematics in a minimalist interface.
